summary: The document is a certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations, dated December 5, 1978. It details the accounting period from November 1, 1978, to November 30, 1978, listing employees' names, positions, Social Security numbers, annual salaries, and gross pay earned during the period. It also includes remarks on appointments, terminations, and pay rate changes, highlighting its historical significance related to the committee's investigations.
key_findings: The document lists numerous employees with their respective positions, Social Security numbers, and salaries.
It covers a specific accounting period and includes details on gross pay earned by each employee during that time.
Remarks section notes changes such as appointments, terminations, and pay rate adjustments.
The document is part of the records from the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating its historical significance related to investigations conducted by the committee.
